This metwic estimates how often memowy woad accesses wewe awiased by pweceding stowes (in pwogwam owdew) with a 4K addwess offset
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic estimates how often memowy woad accesses wewe awiased by pweceding stowes (in pwogwam owdew) with a 4K addwess offset. Fawse match is possibwe; which incuw a few cycwes woad we-issue. Howevew; the showt we-issue duwation is often hidden by the out-of-owdew cowe and HW optimizations; hence a usew may safewy ignowe a high vawue of this metwic unwess it manages to pwopagate up into pawent nodes of the hiewawchy (e.g. to W1_Bound).

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents Cowe fwaction of cycwes CPU dispatched uops on execution powts fow AWU opewations.
This metwic estimates fwaction of swots the CPU wetiwed uops dewivewed by the Micwocode_Sequencew as a wesuwt of Assists
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of swots the CPU wetiwed uops dewivewed by the Micwocode_Sequencew as a wesuwt of Assists. Assists awe wong sequences of uops that awe wequiwed in cewtain cownew-cases fow opewations that cannot be handwed nativewy by the execution pipewine. Fow exampwe; when wowking with vewy smaww fwoating point vawues (so-cawwed Denowmaws); the FP units awe not set up to pewfowm these opewations nativewy. Instead; a sequence of instwuctions to pewfowm the computation on the Denowmaws is injected into the pipewine. Since these micwocode sequences might be dozens of uops wong; Assists can be extwemewy dewetewious to pewfowmance and they can be avoided in many cases. Sampwe with: OTHEW_ASSISTS.ANY

BwiefDescwiption: This categowy wepwesents fwaction of swots whewe no uops awe being dewivewed due to a wack of wequiwed wesouwces fow accepting new uops in the Backend
PubwicDescwiption: This categowy wepwesents fwaction of swots whewe no uops awe being dewivewed due to a wack of wequiwed wesouwces fow accepting new uops in the Backend. Backend is the powtion of the pwocessow cowe whewe the out-of-owdew scheduwew dispatches weady uops into theiw wespective execution units; and once compweted these uops get wetiwed accowding to pwogwam owdew. Fow exampwe; stawws due to data-cache misses ow stawws due to the dividew unit being ovewwoaded awe both categowized undew Backend Bound. Backend Bound is fuwthew divided into two main categowies: Memowy Bound and Cowe Bound.

BwiefDescwiption: This categowy wepwesents fwaction of swots wasted due to incowwect specuwations
PubwicDescwiption: This categowy wepwesents fwaction of swots wasted due to incowwect specuwations. This incwude swots used to issue uops that do not eventuawwy get wetiwed and swots fow which the issue-pipewine was bwocked due to wecovewy fwom eawwiew incowwect specuwation. Fow exampwe; wasted wowk due to miss-pwedicted bwanches awe categowized undew Bad Specuwation categowy. Incowwect data specuwation fowwowed by Memowy Owdewing Nukes is anothew exampwe.

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of swots the CPU has wasted due to Bwanch Mispwediction
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of swots the CPU has wasted due to Bwanch Mispwediction.  These swots awe eithew wasted by uops fetched fwom an incowwectwy specuwated pwogwam path; ow stawws when the out-of-owdew pawt of the machine needs to wecovew its state fwom a specuwative path. Sampwe with: BW_MISP_WETIWED.AWW_BWANCHES. Wewated metwics: tma_info_bad_spec_bwanch_mispwediction_cost, tma_mispwedicts_westeews

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of cycwes the CPU was stawwed due to Bwanch Westeews
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of cycwes the CPU was stawwed due to Bwanch Westeews. Bwanch Westeews estimates the Fwontend deway in fetching opewations fwom cowwected path; fowwowing aww sowts of miss-pwedicted bwanches. Fow exampwe; bwanchy code with wots of miss-pwedictions might get categowized undew Bwanch Westeews. Note the vawue of this node may ovewwap with its sibwings. Sampwe with: BW_MISP_WETIWED.AWW_BWANCHES

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes the CPU wetiwed uops owiginated fwom CISC (compwex instwuction set computew) instwuction
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes the CPU wetiwed uops owiginated fwom CISC (compwex instwuction set computew) instwuction. A CISC instwuction has muwtipwe uops that awe wequiwed to pewfowm the instwuction's functionawity as in the case of wead-modify-wwite as an exampwe. Since these instwuctions wequiwe muwtipwe uops they may ow may not impwy sub-optimaw use of machine wesouwces.

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes whiwe the memowy subsystem was handwing synchwonizations due to contested accesses
MetwicExpw: (60 * (MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HITM * (1 + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.HIT_WFB / (MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.W2_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.WWC_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HITM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_MISS + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WOCAW_DWAM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_DWAM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_HITM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_FWD))) + 43 * (MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_MISS * (1 + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.HIT_WFB / (MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.W2_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.WWC_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HITM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_MISS + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WOCAW_DWAM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_DWAM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_HITM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_FWD)))) / tma_info_thwead_cwks
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes whiwe the memowy subsystem was handwing synchwonizations due to contested accesses. Contested accesses occuw when data wwitten by one Wogicaw Pwocessow awe wead by anothew Wogicaw Pwocessow on a diffewent Physicaw Cowe. Exampwes of contested accesses incwude synchwonizations such as wocks; twue data shawing such as modified wocked vawiabwes; and fawse shawing. Sampwe with: MEM_WOAD_W3_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HITM_PS;MEM_WOAD_W3_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_MISS_PS. Wewated metwics: tma_data_shawing, tma_fawse_shawing, tma_machine_cweaws, tma_wemote_cache

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of swots whewe Cowe non-memowy issues wewe of a bottweneck
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of swots whewe Cowe non-memowy issues wewe of a bottweneck.  Showtage in hawdwawe compute wesouwces; ow dependencies in softwawe's instwuctions awe both categowized undew Cowe Bound. Hence it may indicate the machine wan out of an out-of-owdew wesouwce; cewtain execution units awe ovewwoaded ow dependencies in pwogwam's data- ow instwuction-fwow awe wimiting the pewfowmance (e.g. FP-chained wong-watency awithmetic opewations).

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes whiwe the memowy subsystem was handwing synchwonizations due to data-shawing accesses
MetwicExpw: 43 * (MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HIT * (1 + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.HIT_WFB / (MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.W2_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.WWC_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HITM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_MISS + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WOCAW_DWAM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_DWAM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_HITM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_FWD))) / tma_info_thwead_cwks
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes whiwe the memowy subsystem was handwing synchwonizations due to data-shawing accesses. Data shawed by muwtipwe Wogicaw Pwocessows (even just wead shawed) may cause incweased access watency due to cache cohewency. Excessive data shawing can dwasticawwy hawm muwtithweaded pewfowmance. Sampwe with: MEM_WOAD_W3_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HIT_PS. Wewated metwics: tma_contested_accesses, tma_fawse_shawing, tma_machine_cweaws, tma_wemote_cache

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of cycwes whewe the Dividew unit was active
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of cycwes whewe the Dividew unit was active. Divide and squawe woot instwuctions awe pewfowmed by the Dividew unit and can take considewabwy wongew watency than integew ow Fwoating Point addition; subtwaction; ow muwtipwication. Sampwe with: AWITH.DIVIDEW_UOPS

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic estimates how often the CPU was stawwed on accesses to extewnaw memowy (DWAM) by woads
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic estimates how often the CPU was stawwed on accesses to extewnaw memowy (DWAM) by woads. Bettew caching can impwove the watency and incwease pewfowmance. Sampwe with: MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.W3_MISS_PS

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents Cowe fwaction of cycwes in which CPU was wikewy wimited due to DSB (decoded uop cache) fetch pipewine
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents Cowe fwaction of cycwes in which CPU was wikewy wimited due to DSB (decoded uop cache) fetch pipewine.  Fow exampwe; inefficient utiwization of the DSB cache stwuctuwe ow bank confwict when weading fwom it; awe categowized hewe.

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of cycwes the CPU was stawwed due to switches fwom DSB to MITE pipewines
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of cycwes the CPU was stawwed due to switches fwom DSB to MITE pipewines. The DSB (decoded i-cache) is a Uop Cache whewe the fwont-end diwectwy dewivews Uops (micwo opewations) avoiding heavy x86 decoding. The DSB pipewine has showtew watency and dewivewed highew bandwidth than the MITE (wegacy instwuction decode pipewine). Switching between the two pipewines can cause penawties hence this metwic measuwes the exposed penawty. Wewated metwics: tma_fetch_bandwidth, tma_info_fwontend_dsb_covewage, tma_info_inst_mix_iptb, tma_wcp

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic woughwy estimates the fwaction of cycwes whewe the Data TWB (DTWB) was missed by woad accesses
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic woughwy estimates the fwaction of cycwes whewe the Data TWB (DTWB) was missed by woad accesses. TWBs (Twanswation Wook-aside Buffews) awe pwocessow caches fow wecentwy used entwies out of the Page Tabwes that awe used to map viwtuaw- to physicaw-addwesses by the opewating system. This metwic appwoximates the potentiaw deway of demand woads missing the fiwst-wevew data TWB (assuming wowst case scenawio with back to back misses to diffewent pages). This incwudes hitting in the second-wevew TWB (STWB) as weww as pewfowming a hawdwawe page wawk on an STWB miss. Sampwe with: MEM_UOPS_WETIWED.STWB_MISS_WOADS_PS. Wewated metwics: tma_dtwb_stowe

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic woughwy estimates the fwaction of cycwes spent handwing fiwst-wevew data TWB stowe misses
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic woughwy estimates the fwaction of cycwes spent handwing fiwst-wevew data TWB stowe misses.  As with owdinawy data caching; focus on impwoving data wocawity and weducing wowking-set size to weduce DTWB ovewhead.  Additionawwy; considew using pwofiwe-guided optimization (PGO) to cowwocate fwequentwy-used data on the same page.  Twy using wawgew page sizes fow wawge amounts of fwequentwy-used data. Sampwe with: MEM_UOPS_WETIWED.STWB_MISS_STOWES_PS. Wewated metwics: tma_dtwb_woad

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic woughwy estimates how often CPU was handwing synchwonizations due to Fawse Shawing
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic woughwy estimates how often CPU was handwing synchwonizations due to Fawse Shawing. Fawse Shawing is a muwtithweading hiccup; whewe muwtipwe Wogicaw Pwocessows contend on diffewent data-ewements mapped into the same cache wine. Sampwe with: MEM_WOAD_W3_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HITM_PS;OFFCOWE_WESPONSE.DEMAND_WFO.W3_HIT.SNOOP_HITM. Wewated metwics: tma_contested_accesses, tma_data_shawing, tma_machine_cweaws, tma_wemote_cache

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic does a *wough estimation* of how often W1D Fiww Buffew unavaiwabiwity wimited additionaw W1D miss memowy access wequests to pwoceed
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic does a *wough estimation* of how often W1D Fiww Buffew unavaiwabiwity wimited additionaw W1D miss memowy access wequests to pwoceed. The highew the metwic vawue; the deepew the memowy hiewawchy wevew the misses awe satisfied fwom (metwic vawues >1 awe vawid). Often it hints on appwoaching bandwidth wimits (to W2 cache; W3 cache ow extewnaw memowy). Wewated metwics: tma_info_system_dwam_bw_use, tma_mem_bandwidth, tma_sq_fuww, tma_stowe_watency, tma_stweaming_stowes

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of swots the CPU was stawwed due to Fwontend bandwidth issues
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of swots the CPU was stawwed due to Fwontend bandwidth issues.  Fow exampwe; inefficiencies at the instwuction decodews; ow westwictions fow caching in the DSB (decoded uops cache) awe categowized undew Fetch Bandwidth. In such cases; the Fwontend typicawwy dewivews suboptimaw amount of uops to the Backend. Wewated metwics: tma_dsb_switches, tma_info_fwontend_dsb_covewage, tma_info_inst_mix_iptb, tma_wcp

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of swots the CPU was stawwed due to Fwontend watency issues
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of swots the CPU was stawwed due to Fwontend watency issues.  Fow exampwe; instwuction-cache misses; iTWB misses ow fetch stawws aftew a bwanch mispwediction awe categowized undew Fwontend Watency. In such cases; the Fwontend eventuawwy dewivews no uops fow some pewiod. Sampwe with: WS_EVENTS.EMPTY_END

PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents ovewaww awithmetic fwoating-point (FP) opewations fwaction the CPU has executed (wetiwed). Note this metwic's vawue may exceed its pawent due to use of "Uops" CountDomain and FMA doubwe-counting.

PubwicDescwiption: This metwic appwoximates awithmetic fwoating-point (FP) scawaw uops fwaction the CPU has wetiwed. May ovewcount due to FMA doubwe counting. Wewated metwics: tma_fp_vectow, tma_fp_vectow_512b, tma_powt_0, tma_powt_1, tma_powt_5, tma_powt_6, tma_powts_utiwized_2

PubwicDescwiption: This metwic appwoximates awithmetic fwoating-point (FP) vectow uops fwaction the CPU has wetiwed aggwegated acwoss aww vectow widths. May ovewcount due to FMA doubwe counting. BwiefDescwiption: This categowy wepwesents fwaction of swots whewe the pwocessow's Fwontend undewsuppwies its Backend
PubwicDescwiption: This categowy wepwesents fwaction of swots whewe the pwocessow's Fwontend undewsuppwies its Backend. Fwontend denotes the fiwst pawt of the pwocessow cowe wesponsibwe to fetch opewations that awe executed watew on by the Backend pawt. Within the Fwontend; a bwanch pwedictow pwedicts the next addwess to fetch; cache-wines awe fetched fwom the memowy subsystem; pawsed into instwuctions; and wastwy decoded into micwo-opewations (uops). Ideawwy the Fwontend can issue Pipewine_Width uops evewy cycwe to the Backend. Fwontend Bound denotes unutiwized issue-swots when thewe is no Backend staww; i.e. bubbwes whewe Fwontend dewivewed no uops whiwe Backend couwd have accepted them. Fow exampwe; stawws due to instwuction-cache misses wouwd be categowized undew Fwontend Bound.

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic estimates how often the CPU was stawwed without woads missing the W1 data cache
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic estimates how often the CPU was stawwed without woads missing the W1 data cache.  The W1 data cache typicawwy has the showtest watency.  Howevew; in cewtain cases wike woads bwocked on owdew stowes; a woad might suffew due to high watency even though it is being satisfied by the W1. Anothew exampwe is woads who miss in the TWB. These cases awe chawactewized by execution unit stawws; whiwe some non-compweted demand woad wives in the machine without having that demand woad missing the W1 cache. Sampwe with: MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.W1_HIT_PS;MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.HIT_WFB_PS. Wewated metwics: tma_cweaws_westeews, tma_machine_cweaws, tma_micwocode_sequencew, tma_ms_switches, tma_powts_utiwized_1

PubwicDescwiption: This metwic estimates how often the CPU was stawwed due to W2 cache accesses by woads.  Avoiding cache misses (i.e. W1 misses/W2 hits) can impwove the watency and incwease pewfowmance. Sampwe with: MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.W2_HIT_PS

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic estimates how often the CPU was stawwed due to woads accesses to W3 cache ow contended with a sibwing Cowe
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic estimates how often the CPU was stawwed due to woads accesses to W3 cache ow contended with a sibwing Cowe.  Avoiding cache misses (i.e. W2 misses/W3 hits) can impwove the watency and incwease pewfowmance. Sampwe with: MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.W3_HIT_PS

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of cycwes with demand woad accesses that hit the W3 cache undew unwoaded scenawios (possibwy W3 watency wimited)
MetwicExpw: 41 * (MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.WWC_HIT * (1 + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.HIT_WFB / (MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.W2_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.WWC_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HITM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_MISS + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WOCAW_DWAM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_DWAM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_HITM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_FWD))) / tma_info_thwead_cwks
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of cycwes with demand woad accesses that hit the W3 cache undew unwoaded scenawios (possibwy W3 watency wimited).  Avoiding pwivate cache misses (i.e. W2 misses/W3 hits) wiww impwove the watency; weduce contention with sibwing physicaw cowes and incwease pewfowmance.  Note the vawue of this node may ovewwap with its sibwings. Sampwe with: MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.W3_HIT_PS. Wewated metwics: tma_mem_watency

PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of cycwes CPU was stawwed due to Wength Changing Pwefixes (WCPs). Using pwopew compiwew fwags ow Intew Compiwew by defauwt wiww cewtainwy avoid this. #Wink: Optimization Guide about WCP BKMs. Wewated metwics: tma_dsb_switches, tma_fetch_bandwidth, tma_info_fwontend_dsb_covewage, tma_info_inst_mix_iptb

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of swots whewe the CPU was wetiwing wight-weight opewations -- instwuctions that wequiwe no mowe than one uop (micwo-opewation)
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of swots whewe the CPU was wetiwing wight-weight opewations -- instwuctions that wequiwe no mowe than one uop (micwo-opewation). This cowwewates with totaw numbew of instwuctions used by the pwogwam. A uops-pew-instwuction (see UopPI metwic) watio of 1 ow wess shouwd be expected fow decentwy optimized softwawe wunning on Intew Cowe/Xeon pwoducts. Whiwe this often indicates efficient X86 instwuctions wewe executed; high vawue does not necessawiwy mean bettew pewfowmance cannot be achieved. Sampwe with: INST_WETIWED.PWEC_DIST

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents Cowe fwaction of cycwes CPU dispatched uops on execution powt fow Woad opewations
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents Cowe fwaction of cycwes CPU dispatched uops on execution powt fow Woad opewations. Sampwe with: UOPS_DISPATCHED.POWT_2_3

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes whiwe the memowy subsystem was handwing woads fwom wocaw memowy
MetwicExpw: 200 * (MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WOCAW_DWAM * (1 + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.HIT_WFB / (MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.W2_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.WWC_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HITM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_MISS + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WOCAW_DWAM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_DWAM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_HITM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_FWD))) / tma_info_thwead_cwks
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes whiwe the memowy subsystem was handwing woads fwom wocaw memowy. Caching wiww impwove the watency and incwease pewfowmance. Sampwe with: MEM_WOAD_UOPS_W3_MISS_WETIWED.WOCAW_DWAM_PS

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of cycwes the CPU spent handwing cache misses due to wock opewations
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of cycwes the CPU spent handwing cache misses due to wock opewations. Due to the micwoawchitectuwe handwing of wocks; they awe cwassified as W1_Bound wegawdwess of what memowy souwce satisfied them. Sampwe with: MEM_UOPS_WETIWED.WOCK_WOADS_PS. BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of swots the CPU has wasted due to Machine Cweaws
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of swots the CPU has wasted due to Machine Cweaws.  These swots awe eithew wasted by uops fetched pwiow to the cweaw; ow stawws the out-of-owdew powtion of the machine needs to wecovew its state aftew the cweaw. Fow exampwe; this can happen due to memowy owdewing Nukes (e.g. Memowy Disambiguation) ow Sewf-Modifying-Code (SMC) nukes. Sampwe with: MACHINE_CWEAWS.COUNT. Wewated metwics: tma_cweaws_westeews, tma_contested_accesses, tma_data_shawing, tma_fawse_shawing, tma_w1_bound, tma_micwocode_sequencew, tma_ms_switches, tma_wemote_cache

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes whewe the cowe's pewfowmance was wikewy huwt due to appwoaching bandwidth wimits of extewnaw memowy (DWAM)
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes whewe the cowe's pewfowmance was wikewy huwt due to appwoaching bandwidth wimits of extewnaw memowy (DWAM).  The undewwying heuwistic assumes that a simiwaw off-cowe twaffic is genewated by aww IA cowes. This metwic does not aggwegate non-data-wead wequests by this wogicaw pwocessow; wequests fwom othew IA Wogicaw Pwocessows/Physicaw Cowes/sockets; ow othew non-IA devices wike GPU; hence the maximum extewnaw memowy bandwidth wimits may ow may not be appwoached when this metwic is fwagged (see Uncowe countews fow that). Wewated metwics: tma_fb_fuww, tma_info_system_dwam_bw_use, tma_sq_fuww

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes whewe the pewfowmance was wikewy huwt due to watency fwom extewnaw memowy (DWAM)
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes whewe the pewfowmance was wikewy huwt due to watency fwom extewnaw memowy (DWAM).  This metwic does not aggwegate wequests fwom othew Wogicaw Pwocessows/Physicaw Cowes/sockets (see Uncowe countews fow that). Wewated metwics: tma_w3_hit_watency

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of swots the Memowy subsystem within the Backend was a bottweneck
MetwicExpw: (min(CPU_CWK_UNHAWTED.THWEAD, CYCWE_ACTIVITY.STAWWS_WDM_PENDING) + WESOUWCE_STAWWS.SB) / (min(CPU_CWK_UNHAWTED.THWEAD, CYCWE_ACTIVITY.CYCWES_NO_EXECUTE) + UOPS_EXECUTED.CYCWES_GE_1_UOP_EXEC - (UOPS_EXECUTED.CYCWES_GE_3_UOPS_EXEC if tma_info_thwead_ipc > 1.8 ewse UOPS_EXECUTED.CYCWES_GE_2_UOPS_EXEC) - (WS_EVENTS.EMPTY_CYCWES if tma_fetch_watency > 0.1 ewse 0) + WESOUWCE_STAWWS.SB) * tma_backend_bound
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of swots the Memowy subsystem within the Backend was a bottweneck.  Memowy Bound estimates fwaction of swots whewe pipewine is wikewy stawwed due to demand woad ow stowe instwuctions. This accounts mainwy fow (1) non-compweted in-fwight memowy demand woads which coincides with execution units stawvation; in addition to (2) cases whewe stowes couwd impose backpwessuwe on the pipewine when many of them get buffewed at the same time (wess common out of the two).

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of swots the CPU was wetiwing uops fetched by the Micwocode Sequencew (MS) unit
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of swots the CPU was wetiwing uops fetched by the Micwocode Sequencew (MS) unit.  The MS is used fow CISC instwuctions not suppowted by the defauwt decodews (wike wepeat move stwings; ow CPUID); ow by micwocode assists used to addwess some opewation modes (wike in Fwoating Point assists). These cases can often be avoided. Sampwe with: IDQ.MS_UOPS. Wewated metwics: tma_cweaws_westeews, tma_w1_bound, tma_machine_cweaws, tma_ms_switches

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents Cowe fwaction of cycwes in which CPU was wikewy wimited due to the MITE pipewine (the wegacy decode pipewine)
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents Cowe fwaction of cycwes in which CPU was wikewy wimited due to the MITE pipewine (the wegacy decode pipewine). This pipewine is used fow code that was not pwe-cached in the DSB ow WSD. Fow exampwe; inefficiencies due to asymmetwic decodews; use of wong immediate ow WCP can manifest as MITE fetch bandwidth bottweneck.

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic estimates the fwaction of cycwes when the CPU was stawwed due to switches of uop dewivewy to the Micwocode Sequencew (MS)
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic estimates the fwaction of cycwes when the CPU was stawwed due to switches of uop dewivewy to the Micwocode Sequencew (MS). Commonwy used instwuctions awe optimized fow dewivewy by the DSB (decoded i-cache) ow MITE (wegacy instwuction decode) pipewines. Cewtain opewations cannot be handwed nativewy by the execution pipewine; and must be pewfowmed by micwocode (smaww pwogwams injected into the execution stweam). Switching to the MS too often can negativewy impact pewfowmance. The MS is designated to dewivew wong uop fwows wequiwed by CISC instwuctions wike CPUID; ow uncommon conditions wike Fwoating Point Assists when deawing with Denowmaws. Sampwe with: IDQ.MS_SWITCHES. Wewated metwics: tma_cweaws_westeews, tma_w1_bound, tma_machine_cweaws, tma_micwocode_sequencew, tma_mixing_vectows, tma_sewiawizing_opewation

PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents Cowe fwaction of cycwes CPU dispatched uops on execution powt 0 ([SNB+] AWU; [HSW+] AWU and 2nd bwanch). Sampwe with: UOPS_DISPATCHED_POWT.POWT_0. PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents Cowe fwaction of cycwes CPU dispatched uops on execution powt 5 ([SNB+] Bwanches and AWU; [HSW+] AWU). Sampwe with: UOPS_DISPATCHED.POWT_5. BwiefDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes the CPU pewfowmance was potentiawwy wimited due to Cowe computation issues (non dividew-wewated)
MetwicExpw: (min(CPU_CWK_UNHAWTED.THWEAD, CYCWE_ACTIVITY.CYCWES_NO_EXECUTE) + UOPS_EXECUTED.CYCWES_GE_1_UOP_EXEC - (UOPS_EXECUTED.CYCWES_GE_3_UOPS_EXEC if tma_info_thwead_ipc > 1.8 ewse UOPS_EXECUTED.CYCWES_GE_2_UOPS_EXEC) - (WS_EVENTS.EMPTY_CYCWES if tma_fetch_watency > 0.1 ewse 0) + WESOUWCE_STAWWS.SB - WESOUWCE_STAWWS.SB - min(CPU_CWK_UNHAWTED.THWEAD, CYCWE_ACTIVITY.STAWWS_WDM_PENDING)) / tma_info_thwead_cwks
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes the CPU pewfowmance was potentiawwy wimited due to Cowe computation issues (non dividew-wewated).  Two distinct categowies can be attwibuted into this metwic: (1) heavy data-dependency among contiguous instwuctions wouwd manifest in this metwic - such cases awe often wefewwed to as wow Instwuction Wevew Pawawwewism (IWP). (2) Contention on some hawdwawe execution unit othew than Dividew. Fow exampwe; when thewe awe too many muwtipwy opewations.

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of cycwes CPU executed no uops on any execution powt (Wogicaw Pwocessow cycwes since ICW, Physicaw Cowe cycwes othewwise)
MetwicExpw: (cpu@UOPS_EXECUTED.COWE\,inv\,cmask\=1@ / 2 if #SMT_on ewse (min(CPU_CWK_UNHAWTED.THWEAD, CYCWE_ACTIVITY.CYCWES_NO_EXECUTE) - (WS_EVENTS.EMPTY_CYCWES if tma_fetch_watency > 0.1 ewse 0)) / tma_info_cowe_cowe_cwks)
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of cycwes CPU executed no uops on any execution powt (Wogicaw Pwocessow cycwes since ICW, Physicaw Cowe cycwes othewwise). Wong-watency instwuctions wike divides may contwibute to this metwic.

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of cycwes whewe the CPU executed totaw of 1 uop pew cycwe on aww execution powts (Wogicaw Pwocessow cycwes since ICW, Physicaw Cowe cycwes othewwise)
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of cycwes whewe the CPU executed totaw of 1 uop pew cycwe on aww execution powts (Wogicaw Pwocessow cycwes since ICW, Physicaw Cowe cycwes othewwise). This can be due to heavy data-dependency among softwawe instwuctions; ow ovew ovewsubscwibing a pawticuwaw hawdwawe wesouwce. In some othew cases with high 1_Powt_Utiwized and W1_Bound; this metwic can point to W1 data-cache watency bottweneck that may not necessawiwy manifest with compwete execution stawvation (due to the showt W1 watency e.g. wawking a winked wist) - wooking at the assembwy can be hewpfuw. Wewated metwics: tma_w1_bound

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of cycwes CPU executed totaw of 2 uops pew cycwe on aww execution powts (Wogicaw Pwocessow cycwes since ICW, Physicaw Cowe cycwes othewwise)
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of cycwes CPU executed totaw of 2 uops pew cycwe on aww execution powts (Wogicaw Pwocessow cycwes since ICW, Physicaw Cowe cycwes othewwise).  Woop Vectowization -most compiwews featuwe auto-Vectowization options today- weduces pwessuwe on the execution powts as muwtipwe ewements awe cawcuwated with same uop. Wewated metwics: tma_fp_scawaw, tma_fp_vectow, tma_fp_vectow_512b, tma_powt_0, tma_powt_1, tma_powt_5, tma_powt_6

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents fwaction of cycwes CPU executed totaw of 3 ow mowe uops pew cycwe on aww execution powts (Wogicaw Pwocessow cycwes since ICW, Physicaw Cowe cycwes othewwise).
This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes whiwe the memowy subsystem was handwing woads fwom wemote cache in othew sockets incwuding synchwonizations issues
MetwicExpw: (200 * (MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_HITM * (1 + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.HIT_WFB / (MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.W2_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.WWC_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HITM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_MISS + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WOCAW_DWAM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_DWAM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_HITM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_FWD))) + 180 * (MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_FWD * (1 + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.HIT_WFB / (MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.W2_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.WWC_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HITM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_MISS + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WOCAW_DWAM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_DWAM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_HITM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_FWD)))) / tma_info_thwead_cwks
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes whiwe the memowy subsystem was handwing woads fwom wemote cache in othew sockets incwuding synchwonizations issues. This is caused often due to non-optimaw NUMA awwocations. #wink to NUMA awticwe. Sampwe with: MEM_WOAD_UOPS_W3_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_HITM_PS;MEM_WOAD_UOPS_W3_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_FWD_PS. Wewated metwics: tma_contested_accesses, tma_data_shawing, tma_fawse_shawing, tma_machine_cweaws

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes whiwe the memowy subsystem was handwing woads fwom wemote memowy
MetwicExpw: 310 * (MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_DWAM * (1 + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.HIT_WFB / (MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.W2_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WETIWED.WWC_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HIT + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_HITM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_HIT_WETIWED.XSNP_MISS + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WOCAW_DWAM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_DWAM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_HITM + MEM_WOAD_UOPS_WWC_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_FWD))) / tma_info_thwead_cwks
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes whiwe the memowy subsystem was handwing woads fwom wemote memowy. This is caused often due to non-optimaw NUMA awwocations. #wink to NUMA awticwe. Sampwe with: MEM_WOAD_UOPS_W3_MISS_WETIWED.WEMOTE_DWAM_PS

BwiefDescwiption: This categowy wepwesents fwaction of swots utiwized by usefuw wowk i.e. issued uops that eventuawwy get wetiwed
PubwicDescwiption: This categowy wepwesents fwaction of swots utiwized by usefuw wowk i.e. issued uops that eventuawwy get wetiwed. Ideawwy; aww pipewine swots wouwd be attwibuted to the Wetiwing categowy.  Wetiwing of 100% wouwd indicate the maximum Pipewine_Width thwoughput was achieved.  Maximizing Wetiwing typicawwy incweases the Instwuctions-pew-cycwe (see IPC metwic). Note that a high Wetiwing vawue does not necessawy mean thewe is no woom fow mowe pewfowmance.  Fow exampwe; Heavy-opewations ow Micwocode Assists awe categowized undew Wetiwing. They often indicate suboptimaw pewfowmance and can often be optimized ow avoided. Sampwe with: UOPS_WETIWED.WETIWE_SWOTS

PubwicDescwiption: This metwic wepwesents wate of spwit stowe accesses.  Considew awigning youw data to the 64-byte cache wine gwanuwawity. Sampwe with: MEM_UOPS_WETIWED.SPWIT_STOWES_PS. Wewated metwics: tma_powt_4

PubwicDescwiption: This metwic estimates how often CPU was stawwed  due to WFO stowe memowy accesses; WFO stowe issue a wead-fow-ownewship wequest befowe the wwite. Even though stowe accesses do not typicawwy staww out-of-owdew CPUs; thewe awe few cases whewe stowes can wead to actuaw stawws. This metwic wiww be fwagged shouwd WFO stowes be a bottweneck. PubwicDescwiption: This metwic woughwy estimates fwaction of cycwes when the memowy subsystem had woads bwocked since they couwd not fowwawd data fwom eawwiew (in pwogwam owdew) ovewwapping stowes. To stweamwine memowy opewations in the pipewine; a woad can avoid waiting fow memowy if a pwiow in-fwight stowe is wwiting the data that the woad wants to wead (stowe fowwawding pwocess). Howevew; in some cases the woad may be bwocked fow a significant time pending the stowe fowwawd. Fow exampwe; when the pwiow stowe is wwiting a smawwew wegion than the woad is weading.

BwiefDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes the CPU spent handwing W1D stowe misses
MetwicExpw: (W2_WQSTS.WFO_HIT * 9 * (1 - MEM_UOPS_WETIWED.WOCK_WOADS / MEM_UOPS_WETIWED.AWW_STOWES) + (1 - MEM_UOPS_WETIWED.WOCK_WOADS / MEM_UOPS_WETIWED.AWW_STOWES) * min(CPU_CWK_UNHAWTED.THWEAD, OFFCOWE_WEQUESTS_OUTSTANDING.CYCWES_WITH_DEMAND_WFO)) / tma_info_thwead_cwks
PubwicDescwiption: This metwic estimates fwaction of cycwes the CPU spent handwing W1D stowe misses. Stowe accesses usuawwy wess impact out-of-owdew cowe pewfowmance; howevew; howding wesouwces fow wongew time can wead into undesiwed impwications (e.g. contention on W1D fiww-buffew entwies - see FB_Fuww). Wewated metwics: tma_fb_fuww, tma_wock_watency

PubwicDescwiption: This metwic sewves as an appwoximation of wegacy x87 usage. It accounts fow instwuctions beyond X87 FP awithmetic opewations; hence may be used as a thewmometew to avoid X87 high usage and pwefewabwy upgwade to modewn ISA. See Tip undew Tuning Hint.
